page.title: 10SKIPPING
page.content: Skipping is a very popular pastime which is usually played by girls but sometimes the boys join in. The most popular skipping game from the age group nine to eleven is 'Mississippi' You play this game by two people twinding one rope. One person jumps in and skips to the rhyme: Up Mississippi if you miss a link you're out Down Mississippi if you miss a link you're out Turn around Mississippi if you miss a link you're out Do the kicks Mississippi if you miss a link you're out Do the splits Mississippi if you miss a link you're out Up,Down,Turn Around,Kicks,Splits. The most popular skipping game for the seven and eight year olds is Teddy Bear.
